channel.title: Electronic Mixes by Brian
channel.description: A series of upbeat club tracks. Listen. Download. Enjoy.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: Brian Puerling
channel.itunes:summary: A series of upbeat club tracks. Listen. Download. Enjoy.

item.title: Continuous Six (Unique Blend)
item.description: Marz – Dopes Like that Sound Goldfrapp – Number One (Chumbomundo Mix) Right Said Fred – I’m Too Sexy (Liquid Nations New York Mix) Rihanna – Umbrella (Rafael Lelis Club Mix) Dido – Thank You (Deep Dish Vocal Mix) Madonna – American Life (Peter Rauhofer’s American Anthem Pt. 2) Fedde Le Grand – Put Your Hands Up for Detroit (Dj Da Bomb’s Flawless Blend) New Mason vs. Princess Superstar – Perfect (Exceeder 2007 Martijn Ten Velden Vocal Mix) Felix Da Housecat – Silver Screen Show Scene (Malibu Club Mix) Le Tigre – After Dark (Lo-Fi-Funk Remix)
item.dc:creator: Brian Puerling
item.itunes:summary: Marz – Dopes Like that Sound Goldfrapp – Number One (Chumbomundo Mix) Right Said Fred – I’m Too Sexy (Liquid Nations New York Mix) Rihanna – Umbrella (Rafael Lelis Club Mix) Dido – Thank You (Deep Dish Vocal Mix) Madonna – American Life (Peter Rauhofer’s American Anthem Pt. 2) Fedde Le Grand – Put Your Hands Up for Detroit (Dj Da Bomb’s Flawless Blend) New Mason vs. Princess Superstar – Perfect (Exceeder 2007 Martijn Ten Velden Vocal Mix) Felix Da Housecat – Silver Screen Show Scene (Malibu Club Mix) Le Tigre – After Dark (Lo-Fi-Funk Remix)

item.title: Continuous Five (Club Blend Part Three)
item.description: Franz Ferdinand – Take Me Out (Bebop Remix) Klaxons – Atlantis to Interzone (Crystal Castles Remix) Iio – Smooth (Airbase Remix) Scandal – The Warrior (Dj Tim A Remix) Pink – Who Knew (Bimbo Jones Edit) Gorillaz – Feel Good Inc (Poj Masta Edit) Lady Sovereign – Nine to Five (Jools MF Remix) Talking Heads – Take Me to the River (Atom’s Depth Charge Distortion Mix) Everything But the Girl – Five Fathoms (Kevin Yost Enlightment Mix) Whitney Houston – It’s Not Right But It’s Ok (Thunderpuss Club Mix) Nelly Furtado – Maneater (Peter Rauhofer Revised Remix) Eric Prydz – Good Life Foxx Britney Spears – Toxic (Junior Vasquez Sound Factory Radio Edit) Roxette – Since You’ve Been Dangerous (Dj Tim A Remix)

item.title: Continuous Four (Club Blend Part Two)
item.description: Tegan and Sara – Walking With a Ghost (Party Ben in Paris Mix) Gym Class Heros – Cupid’s Chokehold (Up Tempo) Evermore vs. Dirty South – It’s Too Late (Dirty South Mix) Rihanna – SOS Mind Electric – Dirty Cash Pink – U and Ur Hand (Bimbo Jones Remix) Chris Lake f/ Laura V – Changes Christina Aguilera – Hurt (Ander Standing Dub Intro Mix) Rob Thomas – This is How a Heart Breaks (Ford Club Mix) Imogen Heap – Hide and Seek (Morgan Page Remix) Madonna – Get Together (Jacques Lu Cont Mix) Eric Prydz – Call On Me Royal Melody – Blinded by the Light Gwen Stefani – What Are You Waiting For (Jacques Lu Cont’s TWD Mix) Queen vs. Miami Project – Another One Bites the Dust (DJ Pedro & Oliver Berger Mix) VHS or Beta – You Got Me (The Juan Maclean Remix) Scissor Sisters – She’s My Man (Goose Mix)

item.title: Continuous Three (Club Blend Part One)
item.description: Cosmicity - This City Easy Lover - Divided INXS - Original Sin (Epic Adventure) Madonna - Jump (Junior Sanchez's Misshapes Mix) Ladytron - Playgirl (Felix Da Housecat Glitz Clubhead Mix) Alanis Morissette - Crazy (Claude le Gache Mix) Royal Gigolos - Self Control (Maxi 2005) Cirque du Soleil - One Love Fergie - Glamorous Coldplay - Talk (Thin White Duke Remix) Lumidee f/ Tony Sunshine - She's Like the Wind Cyndi Lauper - Shine (Tracy Young Mix) How Hard & DJ Sanz One - Crazy Train Alcazar - Don't You Want Me (Almighty Club Mix) Lasgo - Something Daft Punk - One More Time Beyonce vs. Justin Timberlake - Sexy Deja Vu (Ottacee Blend) Nelly Furtado - Say It Right Radio Edit infused with Peter Rauhofer Mix Scissor Sisters - She's My Man (Goose Mix)

item.title: Continuous One (Project Runway Inspired)
item.description: Harold Barefoot Sanders III - Get Plastered Erlend Oye and Royksopp – Poor Leno (Silicone Soul’s Hypno House Dub) Madonna – Hung Up (Bill Hamel Remix) Dj Antoine – All We Need INXS – New Sensation (Beginerz Remix) Gambafreaks vs. Moloko – A Style Suite JFK Holla – Fly Girl Benjamin Bates – Whole (Steve Angello Dub) Tommi Cotter f/ Ami Jackson – Swaen Biff Sanders – Prodigal Gorillaz - Dare (Soulwax Remix) Jem – They (MDK and Ayesha Remix)

item.title: Continuous Two (Top 40, New Remixes and 80s Flashback Blend)
item.description: Princess Him - Even Though Madonna – History Comsicity – Orange Royksopp – What Else Is There? (Trentemoller Remix) Justin Timberlake – Sexyback Justin Timberlake – What Goes Around Comes Around (Sebastien Leger Remix) Noir – MTV (Chris Lake Remix) Kelis – Milkshake (Ottacee Remix) Eric Prydz – Proper Education (Sebastian Ingrosso Remix) Nelly Furtado – Promiscuous (Richard Vission Rerub) Nelly Furtado – Maneater (Peter Rauhofer Remix) Pussy Cat Dolls f/ Busta Rymes – Don’t Cha (Ralphi Rosario’s Hot Freak Mix) Dirty South – Sleazy (mr. timothy remix) Filterfunk – S.O.S. Message in a Botttle (Tom Novy Remix) DJ Peter Presta f/ Bonse – Totally Hooked (Club Mix) Baby Bash – Suga Suga (Ottacee Remix)
